meanings.definition: To sprinkle or cover with drops or spots of liquid.
meanings.sent1: I will bedabble the cake with colorful sprinkles.
meanings.sent2: The children love to bedabble each other with water balloons.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally bedabbled her shirt with paint while crafting.
meanings.sent4: The artist's brush seemed to bedabble the canvas with magic.
meanings.sent5: The rain continued to bedabble the window throughout the night.

meanings.definition: To stain or soil with splashes or spots of liquid.
meanings.sent1: The mud from the garden bedabbled the clean floor.
meanings.sent2: The playful puppy bedabbled the carpet with muddy paw prints.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy chef managed to bedabble the kitchen walls with sauce.
meanings.sent4: The ink accidentally bedabbled the important document.
meanings.sent5: The overflowing fountain bedabbled the courtyard with water.
